name: Boy And The Creator
description:
Boy And The Creator

Boy and The Creator is a game about an Intelligent life form that tests the human brain with mind-boggling tasks to try and understand how the human brain actually functions.

  • Interaction - E
  • Jump - Space
  • Double Jump - Space x2
credits Ralph Y. Wong - Programmer  Nic Farmer (Discord: imtrash#9516) - Level Designer & Programmer Daniel Patrick Swain - Music & Sound Momo and meido (momei-doumei.itch.io) - Art and Character Design
